sys_ui_annotation.text: Supplier Details

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Financial Details

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Please enter cost to 'buy in'. Excludes annual costs paid up front.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: For contracts that do not state a specific amount for ongoing costs, please summarise the formula or basis of estimate

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Please enter cost per annum. This can be an estimate.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Please enter the date the above costs are valid as at.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: If contract is perpetual, please enter dummy expiry date 31/12/2099

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Impact of Disruption on Outcomes

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Business Continuity Planning (BCP)

type.display_value: Section Separator

sys_ui_annotation.text: This is expected to include evidence of the timeframes to be achieved and testing of the BCP. Be specific – eg document name, date and relevant pages.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text:
Provide references to evidence. Ensure it covers all aspects of the service.
If the supplier refuses to provide evidence of their BCP/DR, we will need to consider whether we will engage the supplier. We will need to apply to the Reserve Bank to use the supplier (Bronze standard application) and will need an ExCo member to approve. Contact your Operational Risk and Compliance Specialist.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Be specific, include Recovery Time Objective (RTO) and compare to Kiwibank’s expected RTO

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Disaster Recovery (DR)

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: If you are unsure refer to the IT Service Catalogue [link] for a classification (Platinum/Gold/Silver/Bronze/Plastic) and state the related RPO and RTO. If there is no categorisation, please state N/A

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: This is expected to include evidence of the timeframes to be achieved and testing of the DR. Be specific – eg document name, date and relevant pages

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: If the supplier refuses to provide evidence of their BCP/DR, we will need to consider whether we will engage the supplier. We will need to apply to the Reserve Bank to use the supplier (Bronze standard application) and will need an ExCo member to approve. Contact your Operational Risk and Compliance Specialist.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Be specific, include Recovery Point Objective (RPO) and Recovery Time Objective (RTO) and compare to Kiwibank’s expected RPO and RTO

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Gaps in the BCP/DR Arrangements

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Complete this section if there are gaps in the supplier's BCP/DR arrangements

type.display_value: Section header

sys_ui_annotation.text: If it is not feasible for the BCP/DR to be in place and tested before the contract is signed, satisfactory BCP/DR evidence may be put in place after signing but before the service is implemented. You will need to monitor accordingly.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Prescribed Contractual Terms (PCTS)

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Give section refs in the Master Services Agreement (MSA) or in this Agreement (eg Stand-Alone Agreement (SAA), Service Delivery Agreement (SDA) or Statement of Work (SoW).

type.display_value: Section header

sys_ui_annotation.text: Please provide applicable section reference in the MSA, SAA SDA or SoW

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: For contracts not governed by NZ law, you must have an external legal opinion from a lawyer in that jurisdiction that the PCTs achieve the requirements of BS11. Consult the Legal team to obtain. They will know whether an opinion already exists or a suitable firm has already been identified.

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Related Parties

type.display_value: Section header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Please enter date non-objection received OR pre-approval list number

type.display_value: Section sub header with top line

sys_ui_annotation.text: Confirmation and Stakeholders

type.display_value: Section header with top line
